channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- Avamar Virtual Edition
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- Avamar Virtual Edition

item.title: CVE-2020-5341|2024-08-04T08:30:23.314Z -- dell -- avamar%20virtual%20edition
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data Vulnerability Dell EMC Avamar Server versions 7.4.1, 7.5.0, 7.5.1, 18.2, 19.1 and 19.2 and Dell EMC Integrated Data Protection Appliance versions 2.0, 2.1, 2.2, 2.3, 2.4 and 2.4.1 contain a Deserialization of Untrusted Data Vulnerability. A remote unauthenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to send a serialized payload that would execute code on the system.
